name: Hennessy Crusta
preparation:
This cocktail was created by Nazarene Garcia at Hudson Bar & Books for Cognac Classics Week, presented by Liquor.com and Hennessy VSOP Privilège.

Rinse a chilled snifter glass with the whisky, discarding any excess, and set aside.

Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake and strain into the prepared glass over fresh cracked ice.

Garnish with an orange peel.
